segments.text: You are friend of Janet , right ? I am Andrew , Andrew Smith .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nice to meet you , Andrew . I am Noirin , Noirin O'Neil .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , I didn't quite catch that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Noirin , N-O-I-R-I-N , it's an Irish name .
segments.speaker: S2
